sentences.sContent: But the brittleness of silicon limits its uses.
sentences.sContent_eng: But the brittleness of silicon limits its uses.
sentences.sCn: 但是，硅的脆性也限制了其应用范围。

sentences.sContent: The company pioneered the use of the silicon chip.
sentences.sContent_eng: The company pioneered the use of the silicon chip.
sentences.sCn: 这家公司首先使用硅片。

sentences.sContent: They consist of silicon, sand and metal so there’s no any connection to dinosaurs … Besides, we may see corrosion on some of them.
sentences.sContent_eng: They consist of silicon, sand and metal so there’s no any connection to dinosaurs … Besides, we may see corrosion on some of them.
sentences.sCn: 它们是由硅砂和金属构成的，和恐龙蛋没有任何关系……除此之外，我们还能看到它们上面的腐蚀的部分。

phrases.pCn: 硅橡胶；硅掾胶；聚硅铜橡胶

trans.tranOther: a chemical substance that exists as a solid or as a powder and is used to make glass, bricks, and parts for computers. It is a chemical element: symbol Si
